snippet: Visitors from growing economies such as China, Russia and Brazil are helping to prop up the European tourism industry. Given the potential numbers and spending power involved, everyone wants a piece of the trade.
abstract: Visitors from growing economies such as China, Russia and Brazil are helping to prop up the European tourism industry. Given the potential numbers and spending power involved, everyone wants a piece of the trade.

headline.main: Europe Fights to Win More Chinese, BRIC Tourists
